All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPaddleStrategy
    Concrete class extending abstract RemoveBrickStrategyDecorator.
    Ball
    Ball is the main game object.
    BallCollisionCountdownAgent
    An object of this class is instantiated on collision of ball with a brick with a change camera strategy.
    Brick  
    BrickerGameManager
    Game manager - this class is responsible for game initialization, holding references for game objects and calling update methods for every update iteration.
    BrickStrategyFactory
    Factory class for creating Collision strategies
    ChangeCameraStrategy
    Concrete class extending abstract RemoveBrickStrategyDecorator.
    CollisionStrategy
    General type for brick strategies, part of decorator pattern implementation.
    GraphicLifeCounter
    Display a graphic object on the game window showing as many widgets as lives left.
    MockPaddle  
    NumericLifeCounter
    Display a graphic object on the game window showing a numeric count of lives left.
    Paddle
    One of the main game objects.
    Puck
    One of the types of objects that can be set loose when a brick is hit.
    PuckStrategy
    Concrete class extending abstract RemoveBrickStrategyDecorator.
    RemoveBrickStrategy
    Concrete brick strategy implmenting CollisionStrategy interface.
    RemoveBrickStrategyDecorator
    Abstract decorator to add functionality to the remove brick strategy, following the decorator pattern.
    Solutions
